\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 12523}

\subsection*{A Great Buzz Enhancer}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Fah}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 1 bowl & smoked & Cannabis & plant material\\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 &   & oral & Vitamin C & liquid\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 160.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I was at home really bored so I thought about taking mass amounts of vitamin C for enhancement of visuals for bud. I am an experienced bud smoker I have been smoking more than once daily for about 2 years and before that I smoked occasionally for about 5 years. Well to get it all started I decided it get the vitamin C first so I would have time to metabolize it, so I drank 2 20, Oz glasses of OJ. 1 pouch of HI-C, and ingested 2 cough drops. So that's an assload of vitamin C. then I smoked a bong load. 



Wow after about 10 min of smoking the bowl I started to see color patterns on the carpet they would change every few seconds really fast then I looked up on my wall and saw vividly another place and I thought I was there really I thought I was somewhere else like an acid trip it was crazy. The visuals were great but hard to explain.

\end{document}
